# Analysis of Discord Chat in ðŸ’¬ï½œgeneral

## 1. Summary
The chat segment primarily revolves around issues with the Eliza website (eliza.how) being down, while the documentation site (docs.eliza.how) remains functional. Users are inquiring about the status of the platform and seeking alternatives. There's a brief technical question about agent architecture for multi-chain support (Solana, Ethereum). One user is looking for a developer to build an EVM AI agent with specific requirements including CMC information retrieval, crypto operations (transfer, swap, bridge), and smart contract deployment with wallet connection rather than private key authentication. A team member acknowledges they're working on fixing the website issues. There's also a mention of eliza.gg being down and users asking about potential replacements or restoration of the service.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Is https://eliza.how dead? (asked by GPSxtreme) A: Borko confirmed they're working on this issue
Q: If I have an Agent with Solana running, can I add other chains to the same agent or do I need to set up another agent? (asked by Prâ­•f. J) A: Unanswered
Q: Is there an Eliza version where I can post on communities on X? (asked by Jon) A: Unanswered
Q: Is there any news on the eliza.gg replacement? (asked by AlexOP303) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: GPSxtreme | Helpee: Channel members | Context: Reporting that while eliza.how is down, docs.eliza.how/docs/quickstart still works | Resolution: Provided working documentation link
Helper: sam-developer | Helpee: Channel members | Context: Website being down | Resolution: Shared docs.eliza.how link
Helper: jin | Helpee: Channel members | Context: Website issues | Resolution: Explained the frontpage isn't ready yet and they'll provide more advance notice

## 4. Action Items
Type: Technical | Description: Fix the main website (eliza.how) | Mentioned By: Borko
Type: Technical | Description: Develop replacement for eliza.gg | Mentioned By: AlexOP303
Type: Feature | Description: Multi-chain support in a single agent (Solana, Ethereum, others) | Mentioned By: Prâ­•f. J
Type: Feature | Description: EVM AI Agent with wallet connection (not private key) | Mentioned By: OpsDev | Onyx
Type: Feature | Description: X (Twitter) community posting capability | Mentioned By: Jon
